Info

Defines class UnixOperations with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates an API for operating Unix Like OS processes.

class daemonpy.unix_operations.UnixOperations(verbose: bool = False)[source]¶

Bases: object

Defines class UnixOperations with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates an API for operating Unix Like OS processes.

It defines:

attributes:
_PKG_VERBOSE - Console text indicator for process-phase.
_OS_TARGET - List of supported operating systems.
_NO_PROCESS - No such process message.
_unix_status - Unix status (True for unix like OS).
methods:
__init__ - Initials UnixOperations constructor.
unix_status - Property methods for set/get operations.
first_fork - Makes sure that process is not group leader.
second_fork - Won’t be started merely by opening a terminal.
unix_kill - Kills unix like OS process.
_NO_PROCESS: str = 'No such process'¶
_OS_TARGET: List[str] = ['linux', 'linux2']¶
_P_VERBOSE: str = 'DAEMONPY::UNIX_OPERATIONS'¶
_SLEEP: float = 0.1¶
first_fork(verbose: bool = False) → None[source]¶

Makes sure that process is not group leader.

Parameters:

verbose (<bool>) – Enable/Disable verbose option

Exit code:

0 (success fork) | 1 (failed)

Exceptions:

None

second_fork(verbose: bool = False) → None[source]¶

Won’t be started merely by opening a terminal.

Parameters:

verbose (<bool>) – Enable/Disable verbose option

Exit code:

0 (success fork) | 1 (failed)

Exceptions:

None

unix_kill(pid: int, pid_path: str, verbose: bool = False) → bool[source]¶

Kills Unix Like OS process.

Parameters:

  • pid (<int>) – Process ID

  • pid_path (<str>) – PID file path

  • verbose (<bool>) – Enable/Disable verbose option

Returns:

True (success operation) | False

Return type:

<bool>

Exceptions:

ATSTypeError | ATSValueError

property unix_status: bool¶

Property method for getting unix like OS status.

Returns:

Unix like OS status

Return type:

<bool>

Exceptions:

None
